column2: As part of the interview process there you will give a short presentation based off provided data to showcase your data visualization and analytic skills.
You can use the tool of your preference for performing the data analysis (ex: Power BI, Tableau, Excel, SAS, Python, etc.)
Before the final deadline, please email all files and documents related to the project.
Note - Submissions will be final once the deadline has passed, to keep the process equitable for all participating candidates.
We will be evaluating your submission on:
1.  Reporting/coding style and development best practices

This is a synthetic dataset, which contains details of 5 academic years imaginary students at the University of Akron (UA).  Although this is not real student data, it is designed to resemble data from UA and it should not be shared externally.
The University has multiple stakeholders who are interested in the data contained in the provided dataset. These include the Provost's Office, Admission's Office, College Deans, faculty, etc.
1.       Prepare reports/dashboards to track student demographics of incoming students and/or applicants, top programs, diversity differences among colleges, academic quality indicators.
2.       Identify the trends in enrollment data and present your insights
Programming files, queries, workbooks, documentation, and dashboards should be submitted by 11:59pm (EST), Tuesday, December 23rd, 2025.
